DOC.brief_summary: Reflexology treatment may influence the severity of chemotherapy-induced nausea and vomiting. This study aims to investigate the clinical effect of reflexology on chemotherapy-induced nausea and vomiting.
DOC.brief_title: Complementary Effect of Reflexology on Chemotherapy-Induced Nausea and Vomiting
DOC.criteria: Chemotherapy patients Myocardial Infarction in previous 6 months Mechanical colonic obstruction
